summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the behavior of the Fully Sharded Data Parallel (FSDP) strategy within Lightning Fabric, covering aspects such as activation checkpointing, CPU offloading, mixed precision handling, gradient clipping, checkpoint I/O, sharding configurations, timeout settings, and parameter usage.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and correctness of the distributed training strategy implementation, providing confidence that advanced features like sharding, precision control, and checkpoint management work as intended in production environments.
